extracted_entities.name: 1st International Summer School on LLM-based Agents for Software Engineering (LLMA4SE 2025)

organizers: i3Lab by Quercus Software Engineering Group and INTIA
submission_information: Free of charge. Includes all course materials, coffee breaks, daily lunches, one guided tourist activity, and a social dinner. A certificate of attendance will be provided.

organizers_committee: Prof. Dr. Roberto Rodríguez Echeverría, University of Extremadura, Spain
Prof. Dr. José María Conejero, University of Extremadura, Spain
